(Medium)

(High)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/consensus-types/src/payload_pull_params.rs] [Field: recent_max_fill_fraction] [Denormal Numbers] Can recent_max_fill_fraction become a denormal floating point number (very close to zero), causing unexpected comparison results in threshold checks? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/consensus-types/src/payload_pull_params.rs] [Field: user_txn_filter with DirectMempool] [Vector Size] Can PayloadFilter::DirectMempool contain a Vec with billions of TransactionSummary entries causing memory allocation failures or OOM kills? (High)
